name: Andrélon Classic conditioner glans
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Dimethicone, Parfum, Triticum Vulgare Bran (Tarwe) Extract, Honey (Honing) Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba-olie), Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, PEG-150 Distearate, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 15510, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 42090.
